subject: Basketball
Drunken and Reckless Driving
lead_paragraph: As expected, the N.B.A. on Friday barred Nets Coach Jason Kidd for two games after he pleaded guilty in July to a drunken-driving charge.
snippet: As expected, the N.B.A. on Friday barred Nets Coach Jason Kidd for two games after he pleaded guilty in July to a drunken-driving charge.
